title: Did Sheryl Sandberg Suggest US Capitol Riot Was Not Organized on Facebook?
subtitle: The Facebook executive pointed to Facebook's "abilities to stop hate," "standards," and "transparency."
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: Asked if Facebook could have done anything sooner to help prevent the U.S. Capitol riot, Facebook COO Sheryl Sandberg said, "I think these events were largely organized on platforms that don’t have our abilities to stop hate, and don’t have our standards, and don’t have our transparency.”
